name: Satanic Space Squid: Bah Humboldt!
description:
In this game you inhabit the role of the Satanic Space Squid, an ancient and terrifying creature as cold and merciless as the void. Long have you slumbered in the space between worlds... until now.

Now, the ringing of a million infernal bells has roused you from your slumber to face your ancient foe.

Your only enemy? Christmas cheer.

You know that it is only a matter of time before you succumb to the numbing snowballs which your elfin enemies so mercilessly hurl.

The only question?

How many can you take down with you?

v. 1.3.1
